events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering based on your skills in software development and relevant experience.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps.
Your credentials and background have passed the initial screening process. We are impressed with your software engineering experience.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 09:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly for problem-solving and system design questions.
You completed the technical interview with excellent performance demonstrated in coding and system architecture challenges.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-05-12 at 11:00 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
Your HR interview went well. The hiring team appreciates your enthusiasm and alignment with our company's values.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer role. Please review the compensation package and benefits outlined in the attached document.
Thank you for your feedback and questions regarding the offer. We are happy to clarify any details to help you make an informed decision.
We are delighted that you have accepted the offer. Welcome aboard! The onboarding process will begin shortly.
Your onboarding process has started. Our team will assist you with all necessary training and integration activities.
The hiring process for your position is now complete. We look forward to your success as part of our engineering team.
